original_text: Nevertheless, Josiah did not turn away from him, but disguised himself in order to fight with him. He did not listen to the words of Neco from the mouth of God, but came to fight in the plain of Megiddo.
korean_text: 요시야가 몸을 돌이켜 떠나기를 싫어하고 오히려 변장하고 그와 싸우고자 하여 하나님의 입에서 나온 느고의 말을 듣지 아니하고 므깃도 골짜기에 이르러 싸울 때에

sentences.original_text: Josiah did not turn away from him,
in order to fight with him.
He did not listen to the words of Neco from the mouth of God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 입에서 나온 네고의 말을 듣지 않았고,
